analysis.description:
TicTacPotato.timePassed (/unique_contracts/0xab790e676fc8bd57170c352330679a23a510a182.sol#92-97) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- lastBidTime == 0

TicTacPotato._stalemateTransfer has external calls inside a loop:
	- indexToAddress[i].transfer(uint256(SafeMath.div(SafeMath.mul(payout,proportion),100))) (/unique_contracts/0xab790e676fc8bd57170c352330679a23a510a182.sol#165-169)

TicTacPotato.timePassed (/unique_contracts/0xab790e676fc8bd57170c352330679a23a510a182.sol#92-97) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- lastBidTime == 0 (/unique_contracts/0xab790e676fc8bd57170c352330679a23a510a182.sol#94-96)

TicTacPotato.timeLeftToContestStart (/unique_contracts/0xab790e676fc8bd57170c352330679a23a510a182.sol#97-103) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > contestStartTime (/unique_contracts/0xab790e676fc8bd57170c352330679a23a510a182.sol#100-102)

TicTacPotato.CONTEST_INTERVAL should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xab790e676fc8bd57170c352330679a23a510a182.sol#23-24)
TicTacPotato.COOLDOWN_TIME should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xab790e676fc8bd57170c352330679a23a510a182.sol#24)
TicTacPotato.NUM_TILES should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xab790e676fc8bd57170c352330679a23a510a182.sol#21-22)
TicTacPotato.START_PRICE should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xab790e676fc8bd57170c352330679a23a510a182.sol#22-23)
TicTacPotato.TIME_TO_STALEMATE should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xab790e676fc8bd57170c352330679a23a510a182.sol#20-21)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0xab790e676fc8bd57170c352330679a23a510a182.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_contracts/0xab790e676fc8bd57170c352330679a23a510a182.sol#1): it allows old versions
